dlx

类 DLX

  • java.lang.Object
    • dlx.DLX

  • public class DLX
extends java.lang.Object
    Class DLX. Public interface by Main or GUI.
    版本:
    2.1 Support eliminating duplicated solutions caused by identical tiles. 11/29/2014, 2.0 Support single step and single solution searching. 11/27/2014, 1.1 Split the algorithm into several files. 11/26/2014, 1.0 Modified on 11/22/2014 Dawei Fan 1) Added a list position used to store the result for GUI. 2) Added spin, spinflip, modified chooseColumnObject to deal with all scenarios: no spin, spin, spin and flip. 3) Added a directly fail detection. If there are no extra tiles, and one tile has no positions, then directly fail. 4) Minor changes: getters and setters for private members., 0.1 Created on 11/17/2014
    作者:
    Deyuan Guo, Dawei Fan
